column5: I am looking into a folding hitch that would allow me to store my boat in the garage. Does anybody have any experience with these, I would appreciate some feed back on your experience.  Thanks
You mean a folding trailer tounge right? I have one. It works fine. Its great for saving space in the driveway. Just don't forget to put the pin in...DAMHIKT
If I recall correctly, Icefisherman (Emil) installed one on his Lund... prehaps a PM to him would help? HH

We must be talking about 2 different things. This has to be part of the trailer originally.   OK, I googled this http://shop.easternmarine.com/index.cfm?fu...;categoryID=215  forgetting the pin http://www.boatingabc.com/forums/ubbthread...ue_Don_t_f.html   I don't think I like the add on kit. Mine is all welded plates and very solid. Drilling and bolting that light wall tubing scares me a bit.
its easy line it up mark the holes and drill away
